text:
I just made a slight pivot into content strategy and product marketing. At eBay right now instead of developing blogs/whitepapers/etc. I'm pretty much handling all written collateral production involved with product/experience messaging.

Quite a bit of analysis, community management, localization, etc.  - So there's still some production, but it's all strategically driven.

Since my core team is all product marketing managers, and experience researchers, I'm absorbing quite a few skills that I intend to develop further throughout my career.
